text: Bridge to Nowhere is a 1986 New Zealand American horror thriller movie directed by Ian Mune and starring Bruno Lawrence, Matthew Hunter, Margaret Umbers, Shelly Luxford, Stephen Judd, Philip Gordon. It was distributed by Mirage Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 thriller movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:New Zealand horror movies Category:New Zealand thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Ian Mune
title: Bridge to Nowhere
